MeshParticleRenderer Class Reference

This class displays the particle system with each particle sharing a mesh. More...

Detailed Description

This class displays the particle system with each particle sharing a mesh.

bool MeshParticleRenderer::isSuitableVisual ( const std::string &  v  )  [static]

This method returns true if the visual is suitable to be displayed by this renderer.

The MeshParticleRenderer requires visuals to be exported using the "MeshParticle" option in the exporter.

Parameters:
v name of the visual to check
Returns:
bool true iff the visual is of the required type.
